results.raw_content:
# Events

### Friday, August 15

![A speaker pointing out a detail to a group of people in a gallery looking at tapestries.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2F4qppsr5i%2Ffilipwolak_gardenday2023_0054_9578.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Met Expert Talks at The Met Cloisters—Barnard’s Collection](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/talks/cloisters/met-expert-talks-at-the-met-cloisters/fy26/met-expert-talks-cloisters-barnard-s-collection/)

Join Museum experts for a deep dive into a selection of exhibition objects in the galleries.

![](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fpytay445%2Fdatenight_met_pl-81386.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Date Night at The Met](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/marketing/date-night-at-the-met/fy26/august/date-night-august-15-16/)

Enjoy live music, drink specials, and 5,000 years of art.

![A group of young people observing and analyzing off-camera artwork in an art gallery.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2F3k2ga1e5%2Fthe-observant-eye.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [The Observant Eye](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/academic-and-research-programs/college-and-university-programs/the-observant-eye/fy26/the-observant-eye/)

Slow down, tap into your powers of observation, and discover a work of art through close looking and discussion.

### Saturday, August 16

![](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fjw0lpnt1%2Fabout_met-facade_large-1.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Weekend Member Mornings](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/membership/weekend-member-mornings/weekend-member-mornings-august-16/)

Start your weekend at The Met! Members are invited to experience select exhibitions before public hours.

![Image of a watercolor painting by Emily Sargent showing a seascape with a boat in the water and figures on the beach.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Faq5f0zfl%2Fdp-28675-001-tif-original-jpg-original-300dpi.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Studio Workshop—Plein Air Watercolor Painting in Central Park](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/creative-practice/studio-workshops/fy26/studio-workshop-plein-air-watercolor-painting/)

Learn new art-making methods with the guidance of expert artists and designers and create your own artwork.

![A man, woman, and a female child stand among tall grasses and plants. The child is holding a book with a red cover. They are looking at something that is out of our purview. Behind them, Met visitors are sitting between decorative marble arches.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fgidl5nkv%2Fla-experienca-medieval.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [CANCELED—La Experiencia Medieval: Talleres Bilingües y Educativos](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/cloisters/la-experiencia-medieval/fy26/canceled-la-experiencia-medieval-talleres-bilinguees-y-educativos/)

Compartan sus ideas y disfruten participando en actividades en las salas para dar vida a las obras de arte medieval.

![](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fpytay445%2Fdatenight_met_pl-81386.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Date Night at The Met](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/marketing/date-night-at-the-met/fy26/august/date-night-august-15-16/)

Enjoy live music, drink specials, and 5,000 years of art.

### Sunday, August 17

![](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fjw0lpnt1%2Fabout_met-facade_large-1.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Weekend Member Mornings](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/membership/weekend-member-mornings/weekend-member-mornings-august-17/)

Start your weekend at The Met! Members are invited to experience select exhibitions before public hours.

![](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fj2ldyhga%2F721-cloisters-hdtdt.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [How Did They Do That?—Frescoes](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/cloisters/how-did-they-do-that/fy26/how-did-they-do-that-frescoes/)

Peek at technique and learn—through handling tools and materials—how works of art were created.

### Tuesday, August 19

![A Met educator reads a picture book to a group of children seated on the floor. They sit in a room filled with potted plants and surrounded by arched columns.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2F5obeux5q%2Fstorytime-at-the-met-cloisters.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Storytime at The Met Cloisters—Fun in the Sun!](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/cloisters/storytime-at-the-met-cloisters/fy26/storytime-at-the-met-cloisters-fun-in-the-sun/)

Look, listen, sing, and have fun with picture-book readings connected to objects in The Met collection.

![Una foto de una charla. Rodeada por una exposición, un ponente interactúa con un pequeño grupo.  ](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Foxrjm25z%2Fnew-stock-image-for-expert-talks.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Met Expert Talks—Recasting the Past](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/talks/public-programs/met-expert-talks/fy26/met-expert-talks-recasting-the-past/)

Join Museum experts for a deep dive into a selection of exhibition objects in the galleries.

### Wednesday, August 20

![A group of nine college students in casual clothes stand in a gallery listening to someone speaking mostly off-camera, in the foreground. ](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fengage.metmuseum.org%2Fmedia%2Fwaofc0pl%2Fundergraduate-and-graduate-internship-program-online-information-sessions-marquee.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### [Undergraduate and Graduate Internship Program Online Information Session](https://engage.metmuseum.org/events/education/workshops-and-classes/academic-and-research-programs/college-and-university-programs/undergraduate-and-graduate-internship-program-online-information-sessions/fy25/undergraduate-and-graduate-internship-program-online-information-session/)

Join an online information session to learn about the 2026 Undergraduate and Graduate Internship Program and application.
